info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL ANDERSON COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Anderson. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Homeland Park, Belton, Northlake, Anderson Airport, and Broadway Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
